name: REPARATIVE
description:
Newly hired by Reparative Faith Counseling, you take your first unsupervised client. How the sessions go is up to you.

Play, experiment, share, feel the feels! If anything in the game resonates with you, please, please donate (100% of donations go to Transgender Law Center)

You can find out more about TLC at www.transgenderlawcenter.org

(And feel free to say hello on Twitter!)

Rest in power Leelah, along with the many other trans women we've lost (so many trans women of color in the first 8 weeks of 2015 alone.) Power and love.
